statements: SELECT * FROM energy_demand_forecasting WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT demand_kwh, forecasted_demand_kwh FROM energy_demand_forecasting WHERE demand_kwh > 1000;
SELECT date, time, forecasted_demand_kwh FROM energy_demand_forecasting WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM energy_demand_forecasting WHERE forecasted_demand_kwh IS NOT NULL;
SELECT date, time, demand_kwh, forecasted_demand_kwh FROM energy_demand_forecasting ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_demand_forecasting ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC
SELECT id, date, SUM(demand_kwh) AS total_demand FROM energy_demand_forecasting GROUP BY date ORDER BY total_demand DESC
SELECT id, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date, TIME_FORMAT(time, '%H:%i:%s') AS formatted_time FROM energy_demand_forecasting WHERE demand_kwh > 100
SELECT date, AVG(demand_kwh) AS avg_demand FROM energy_demand_forecasting WHERE forecasted_demand_kwh IS NULL GROUP BY date HAVING avg_demand > 50 ORDER BY date
SELECT id, date, time, forecasted_demand_kwh FROM energy_demand_forecasting WHERE forecasted_demand_kwh BETWEEN 200 AND 300 ORDER BY forecasted_demand_kwh DESC
SELECT * FROM EnergyDemandForecast WHERE demand_kwh > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC, forecast_time ASC;
SELECT forecast_date, forecasted_demand_kwh FROM EnergyDemandForecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT schedule_date, charging_duration_hours, energy_consumed_kwh FROM ChargingSchedule WHERE charging_station_id = 1 ORDER BY schedule_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyDemandForecast WHERE forecast_date = '2022-02-15';
SELECT schedule_date, schedule_time, energy_consumed_kwh FROM ChargingSchedule WHERE energy_consumed_kwh >= 50 ORDER BY schedule_date ASC, schedule_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyDemandForecast WHERE demand_kwh > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC, forecast_time ASC
SELECT forecast_date, SUM(demand_kwh) AS total_demand FROM EnergyDemandForecast GROUP BY forecast_date HAVING total_demand > 500 ORDER BY total_demand DESC
SELECT MAX(demand_kwh) AS max_demand, MIN(demand_kwh) AS min_demand FROM EnergyDemandForecast WHERE forecast_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed_kwh) AS avg_energy_consumed, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM ChargingSchedule WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-31'
SELECT schedule_date, schedule_time, charging_duration_hours FROM ChargingSchedule WHERE energy_consumed_kwh < 50 ORDER BY schedule_date ASC, schedule_time ASC
SELECT * FROM energy_demand_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC, forecast_time ASC
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, forecast_value FROM energy_demand_forecast WHERE forecast_value > 100
SELECT station_name, location FROM charging_station
SELECT * FROM charging_schedule ORDER BY scheduled_date ASC
SELECT station_name, total_chargers FROM charging_station WHERE total_chargers >= 5
SELECT * FROM energy_demand_forecast
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, forecast_value FROM energy_demand_forecast WHERE forecast_value > 100
SELECT * FROM charging_schedule ORDER BY scheduled_date, scheduled_time DESC
SELECT station_name, location, total_chargers FROM charging_station WHERE total_chargers >= 10
SELECT schedule_id, vehicle_id, scheduled_date, scheduled_time, charging_status FROM charging_schedule
SELECT * FROM energy_demand;
SELECT location_id, demand_kwh FROM energy_demand ORDER BY demand_kwh DESC;
SELECT location_name, address FROM locations WHERE location_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT timestamp, temperature, weather_conditions FROM weather_data WHERE location_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND temperature > 25;
SELECT schedule_id, charging_start, charging_end FROM charging_schedule ORDER BY charging_start ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_demand;
SELECT location_name, address FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT timestamp, demand_kwh FROM energy_demand WHERE demand_kwh > 1000;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_id, SUM(demand_kwh) AS total_demand FROM energy_demand GROUP BY location_id ORDER BY total_demand DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionForecast;
SELECT station_name, location FROM ChargingStations WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT id, date, start_time, end_time FROM ChargingEvents ORDER BY date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_price FROM EnergyPrices;
SELECT date, hour, temperature FROM WeatherForecast WHERE temperature < 20 ORDER BY temperature ASC, date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionForecast ORDER BY date DESC, hour ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT station_name, location, available_spots FROM ChargingStations WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY station_name ASC
SELECT AVG(energy_demand) AS avg_demand, MAX(energy_demand) AS max_demand, MIN(energy_demand) AS min_demand FROM EnergyConsumptionForecast WHERE date = '2022-05-15'
SELECT station_name, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM ChargingStations INNER JOIN ChargingEvents ON ChargingStations.id = ChargingEvents.station_id GROUP BY station_name ORDER BY total_events DESC
SELECT date, hour, temperature FROM WeatherForecast WHERE temperature < 10 ORDER BY date ASC, hour DESC
